ðŸ“– Summary: anyapk is a lightweight Android application installer that bypasses developer verification requirements using local ADB connections, allowing users to install any APK file without restrictions. It aims to return control of application installation to the user, emphasizing digital autonomy and freedom from corporate or governmental gatekeepers.
